txt.en: 'I was badly wounded after the giant threw me in Scylfig.'
'I did not remember who I was until I saw you.'
'My ribs were cracked, and my head ached.'
'I only knew that I should kill the Orcs.'
'My lungs cannot bear this, I'm afraid. My ribs are not mended.'
'I did not understand my hatred of them, but it gave my darkened mind a purpose.'
'[placeholder] -- you shall blow the horn. Thrymm, you shall fight the giant.'
'I am glad you are yourself again!'
'Let us go to Gárwig at once, and talk more as we travel.'
'I am beginning to form a plan....'
'Apparently the horn is the key to weakening Núrzum.'
'We will find Núrzum, and Thrymm can blow the horn!'
